Toolbar can be used for navigation between pages or actions on the page and has icons and labels.

Normal toolbar

By default it will take the whole space in the container and will be aligned horizontally

Labels below and active state

You can use "zs-toolbar-labels-below" class and "zs-active" class to put labels below icons and highlight an active item.

Icons only

You can use just icons by removing elements with label from the toolbar items.

Small icons

You case alternative icon sizes.

Vertical

"zs-toolbar-vertical" class will help you to align toolbar vertically. But keep in mind you need to use a proper container for that too.

Vertical with items aligned

Sometimes you want to align all items to the left. Use "zs-toolbar-align-left" for that.
